statements: SELECT * FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory;
SELECT category, product_name, price FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory WHERE category = 'T-shirts';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory WHERE price < 20.00;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory WHERE category='T-shirts' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, category FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 50;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM wrestling_merchandise_inventory GROUP BY category HAVING total_products > 3 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM t_shirts;
SELECT t_shirt_name, t_shirt_color FROM t_shirts;
SELECT t_shirt_id, t_shirt_name, t_shirt_price FROM t_shirts ORDER BY t_shirt_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM action_figures WHERE action_figure_price > 50;
SELECT action_figure_name, action_figure_description FROM action_figures;
SELECT t_shirt_name, t_shirt_size, t_shirt_color FROM t_shirts WHERE t_shirt_price > 50 ORDER BY t_shirt_price DESC;
SELECT t_shirt_name, t_shirt_color FROM t_shirts WHERE t_shirt_size = 'Large' AND t_shirt_color = 'Blue';
SELECT t_shirt_name, t_shirt_price FROM t_shirts WHERE t_shirt_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY t_shirt_price;
SELECT action_figure_name, action_figure_price FROM action_figures WHERE action_figure_description LIKE '%hero%' ORDER BY action_figure_price DESC;
SELECT t_shirt_name, t_shirt_color, action_figure_name FROM t_shirts INNER JOIN action_figures ON t_shirts.t_shirt_price = action_figures.action_figure_price;
SELECT * FROM t_shirts;
SELECT id, color, price FROM t_shirts WHERE size='M';
SELECT id, series FROM action_figures ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM posters WHERE size='L' AND price > 20.00;
SELECT title, price FROM posters WHERE title LIKE '%Nature%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM t_shirts WHERE price > 20 ORDER BY size ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT color, COUNT(*) FROM t_shirts GROUP BY color HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM t_shirts WHERE size = 'Medium' AND price < 30;
SELECT MAX(price) FROM t_shirts;
SELECT id, name, series FROM action_figures WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM t_shirts WHERE color='Red';
SELECT id, price, color FROM t_shirts WHERE price > 20.00;
SELECT size, color FROM t_shirts WHERE size='M' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM posters WHERE price < 15.00 AND size='11x17';
SELECT item_id, item_type FROM inventory WHERE in_stock=true;
SELECT id, color FROM t_shirts WHERE price > 30 ORDER BY color DESC;
SELECT * FROM action_figures WHERE franchise = 'Marvel' AND price < 50;
SELECT title, price FROM posters WHERE size = 'Medium';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'Action Figure' OR item_type = 'T-Shirt' AND in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY item_type, item_id;
SELECT id, name, franchise FROM action_figures WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT name, size, color FROM t_shirts;
SELECT * FROM action_figures WHERE franchise = 'Marvel';
SELECT id, title, price FROM posters ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 't_shirts';
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM t_shirts WHERE price > 30 ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT name, color FROM t_shirts WHERE size = 'XL';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM action_figures WHERE franchise = 'Marvel';
SELECT name, price FROM posters WHERE theme LIKE '%Movie%';
SELECT t.name, i.quantity FROM t_shirts t JOIN inventory i ON t.id = i.item_id WHERE i.quantity > 0;
